amendatorysection.catchline: Repealed. Laws 2014, LB749, § 298. Operative date January 1, 2017. Voting agreements.
amendatorysection.para: (1) Two or more shareholders may provide for the manner in which they will vote their shares by signing an agreement for that purpose. A voting agreement created under this section shall not be subject to the provisions of section 21-2067.
(2) A voting agreement created under this section shall be specifically enforceable.
